title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Seizin was givenher in June 1503, at Galashiels, by John Murray ofFalahill, Sheriff of Selkirk; and the deed waswitnessed, among others, by Sir Walter Scott ofBuccleuch.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: It was afterwards conferred on the members of other families of distinction, till it fell intothe hands of John Murray of Falahill, the deputyof Lord Erskine, and the supposed " Outlaw" of traditionary song.
